subject: Football
lead_paragraph: A metropolitan area with the slogan “Entertainment Capital of the World” is not easily swept off its feet. Still, those who were looking could find bursts of enthusiasm over the return of the N.F.L.
snippet: A metropolitan area with the slogan “Entertainment Capital of the World” is not easily swept off its feet. Still, those who were looking could find bursts of enthusiasm over the return of the N.F.L.
